Name: Establishing reporting requirements for the department of citywide administrative services on the status of city-owned real property.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing reporting requirements for the department of citywide administrative services on the status of city-owned real property

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Governmental Operations
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
This Introduction was Amended by Committee
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by Consent Roll Call.
This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Mayor
This Introduction was Signed Into Law by Mayor
This Introduction was Recved from Mayor by Council

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\ul Be it enacted by the Council as follows\ulnone :\par
 \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1 Section 1.  Chapter 2 of title 4 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 4-208 to read as follows:\par
\ul\'a7 4-208.  List of City-Owned and Operated Real Property.  a. The department of citywide administrative services shall keep and maintain a complete list of the location and current use of all real property owned or leased by the city.  For each parcel of property, such list shall include, but need not be limited to, the following information to the extent such information is available: \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1 1) the map on which the property appears in the most recent atlas of the property; \par
2) the tax block number; \par
3) the tax lot number; \par
4) the address or name of the property, if applicable; \par
5) the agency to which the property is assigned; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1 6) sufficient information to determine the property\rquote s current use or to determine that it has no current use; \par
7) total area of the property, expressed in square feet and rounded to the nearest integer;\par
8) whether the property contains the presence of an open petroleum spill;\par
9) whether the property is enrolled in a government cleanup program, and if so, the name of such program;  \par
10) the year construction of the structure or structures was completed and whether such year is an estimate, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1 11) the number of structures, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1 12) total gross area of all structures expressed in square feet and rounded to the nearest integer, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1 13) ratio of building floor area to the area of the property, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1 14) allowable ratio of building floor area to the area of the property, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1 15) land use category as defined by the department of city planning; \par
16) the community district; \par
17) the most recent census tract; \par
18) the most recent census block; \par
19) the community school district; \par
20) the city council district; \par
21) the zip code; \par
22) the fire company that services the property; \par
23) the health area; \par
24) the health center district; \par
25) the police precinct; \par
26) the major use of the structure or structures, where applicable; \par
27) the number of easements, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1 28) the exterior dimensions of the portion of the structure or structures allocated for commercial use, where applicable; \par
29) the exterior dimensions of the portion of the structure or structures allocated for residential use, where applicable; \par
30) the exterior dimensions of the portion of the structure or structures allocated for office use, where applicable; \par
31) the exterior dimensions of the portion of the structure or structures allocated for retail use, where applicable; \par
32) the exterior dimensions of the portion of the structure or structures allocated for garage use, where applicable; \par
33) the exterior dimensions of the portion of the structure or structures allocated for storage or loft use, where applicable; \par
34) the exterior dimensions of the portion of the structure or structures allocated for factory use, where applicable; \par
35) the exterior dimensions of the portion of the structure or structures allocated for a use or uses other than residential, office, retail, garage, storage, loft or factory use, where applicable; \par
36) the number of full and partial stories starting from the ground floor in the primary structure, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1 37) the sum of residential units in all structures, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1 38) the sum of residential and non-residential units in all structures, where applicable;\par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1  39) the frontage, measured in feet;\par
 40) the depth, measured in feet; \par
\ulnone  \ul 41) the frontage along the street, measured in feet; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 42) the depth of the structure or structures, which is the effective perpendicular distance, measured in feet, where applicable; \par
\ulnone  \ul 43) whether the structure or structures are detached, semi-detached or attached to neighboring structures, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 44) whether the property is irregularly shaped; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 45) the location relative to another lot or the water, expressed as mixed or unknown, block assemblage, waterfront, corner, through, inside, interior, island, alley or submerged land; \par
\ulnone  \ul 46) a description of the basement, expressed as none, full basement that is above grade, full basement that is below grade, partial basement that is above grade, partial basement that is below grade or unknown; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 47) the actual assessed value as of the most recent fiscal year; \par
\ulnone  \ul 48) the actual exempt land value as of the most recent fiscal year; \par
\ulnone  \ul 49) the actual exempt total value as of the most recent fiscal year; \par
\ulnone  \ul 50) the year of the most recent alteration, where applicable; \par
\ulnone  \ul 51) the year of the second most recent alteration, where applicable;\par
\ulnone  \ul 52) the name of the historic district, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 53) whether the property is a landmark and, if so, the name of such landmark, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 54) the condominium number assigned to the complex, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 55) the coordinate of the XY coordinate pair that depicts the property\rquote s approximate location as expressed in the New York-Long Island state plane coordination system; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 56) the e-designation number associated with the property, where applicable; \par
\ulnone  \ul 57) whether the property is located in an industrial business zone; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 58) the primary zoning classification of the property; \par
\ulnone  \ul 59) the zoning designation occupying the second greatest percentage of the property\rquote s area, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 60) the primary commercial overlay assigned to the property, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 61) the commercial overlay occupying the second greatest percentage of the property\rquote s area, where applicable; \par
\ulnone  \ul 62) the special purpose or limited height district assigned to the property, where applicable; \par
\ulnone  \ul 63) the special purpose or limited height district assigned to the property occupying the second greatest percentage of the property\rquote s area, where applicable; \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 64) whether the land is potentially suitable for urban agriculture; and\par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\li720\sl480\slmult1\ulnone  \ul 65) agency contact information, including name, telephone number and email address.\par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\sl480\slmult1 b. For each property managed by the economic development corporation, such list shall include the percentage of usable space actually occupied by a tenant or tenants.\par
c. Such list shall be made available to the public at no charge on a website maintained by or on behalf of the city of New York in a sortable and searchable format and for download at no charge from such website in a non-proprietary database format.  Such list shall be completely updated no less than once every two years. \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1\ulnone\'a7 2.  This local law shall take effect one hundred twenty days after its enactment into law.  \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fs22\par
SAG \par
\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sa150 7/19/11 2:20 pm\par
